cms.contentitemcommondata.BasicItemShortDescription: Kentico MVP Elmar Höfinghoff explains why Xperience by Kentico's Resuable Field Schemas (RFS) are more flexible than content type "inheritance", some common use cases for RFS, and how to generate C# types to use RFSs in your Xperience code base. (The article is originally in German, but you can use ChatGPT or your browser to translate it for you 😀)
cms.contentitemcommondata.BasicItemTitle: Inheritance made easy with Reusable Field Schemas in Xperience by Kentico
